rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual information using neutral language.
The segment discusses financial/trade metrics ('banning or limiting poultry imports'), which are Neutral.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports negative economic impact; lacks explicit calming language.
The segment reports banning/limiting imports, not a negation.
The segment reports impact (export restrictions), not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes actions (banning or limiting imports), not factual reporting of prices/metrics.
The segment reports a past event (banning/limiting imports), not speculation about future relief or improvement.
Segment contains no direct quote or clearly attributed statement.
Factual report of consequences (banning/limiting imports) without explicit framing cues.
